poem:
**Stitches and Numbers**

After 44 days of silent wards,  
scalpel to air, a sterile pause,  
the ink dries on a fragile promise:  
22.3% more thread for the cloth  
of care. Junior hands steady again,  
hearts ticking to the rhythm of a  
compromise, dreaming of nights  
not spent counting the cost  
of kindness.
